data.title: Stig Egil Bojesen
data.meta_site_name: The Capital Region of Denmark's Research Portal
data.text:
Expertises

Clinical biochemistry; biomarkers; genetics; epidemiology; cancer.

Main research areas

By investigating disease mechanisms in the general population, we hope to identify novel - as well as qualify known - blood borne markers of risk before diagnosis and prognosis/treatment response after diagnosis.

"

Current research

To identify, describe, and use markers of risk of breast cancer, lung cancer, and malignant melanoma.

Potential conflicts of interest

None.
